Uses of Package
com.mygdx.othello.controllers

  • Packages that use com.mygdx.othello.controllers 
    Package Description
    com.mygdx.othello  
    com.mygdx.othello.controllers  
    com.mygdx.othello.views  
  • Classes in com.mygdx.othello.controllers used by com.mygdx.othello 
    Class Description
    GameStateManager
    This class manages the overall state of the game through a Stack of Screen and a GameData class it is the overall controller of the game that manages the saving, the screens and controllers
  • Classes in com.mygdx.othello.controllers used by com.mygdx.othello.controllers 
    Class Description
    AbstractController
    This class is the template for all Controllers in the application
    GameController
    This class manages the game logic while playing as well as all the touch inputs on the screen
    GameStateManager
    This class manages the overall state of the game through a Stack of Screen and a GameData class it is the overall controller of the game that manages the saving, the screens and controllers
  • Classes in com.mygdx.othello.controllers used by com.mygdx.othello.views 
    Class Description
    AbstractController
    This class is the template for all Controllers in the application
    GameController
    This class manages the game logic while playing as well as all the touch inputs on the screen
    GameStateManager
    This class manages the overall state of the game through a Stack of Screen and a GameData class it is the overall controller of the game that manages the saving, the screens and controllers
    MenuController
    This class manages touch inputs on the Menu Screen
    RulesController
    This class manages the touch input on the Rules Screen
    SettingsController
    This class manages the Settings logic, namely allows to save the preferences, and the touch inputs on the screen
